title: Challenge-Based Biomechanics Simulation Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Utilizes smartphone-based lightweight VR solutions, designed around practical application case studies

learning_goals: Efficiency analysis of exercise and improvement strategies can be proposed by applying biomechanical principles
Biomechanical errors in actual exercise movements can be diagnosed and solutions designed in a simulation environment
Strategies to prevent predictable injuries can be developed by applying learned knowledge to new exercise scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
